mdRecord.dcterms:title: Second Man; How The Other Half Lives
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Playbill for the shows Second Man by S.N. Behrman, Sep 6, 1978. Directed by Rex Partington, Scenery by F. Leonard Darby, Costumes by Carr Garnett, Lighting by Sara Ross Morgan. | How The Other Half Lives by Alan Ayckbourn, Sep 13, 1978. Directed by Edward Stern, Scenery by Bennet Averyt, Costumes by Carr Garnett, Lighting by Sara Ross Morgan.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
